definition: to amass/to accumulate/to store/measured quantity (such as area of volume)/product (the result of multiplication)/to integrate (math.)/to solve (or integrate) an ordinary differential equation (math.)/old/long-standing

sentences.english: The law will also stop the backlog from growing.
sentences.chinese: 新法也会使积案不再增长。

sentences.english: Various conditionality results in increasingly growth of long-pending criminal cases.
sentences.chinese: 由于各种条件的限制，导致了刑事积案与日俱增。

definition: to investigate (as detective)/to solve (crime)/to uncover (a plot)/to sniff out/to break in and analyze/detective work/to scout
escaped criminal/fugitive from the law (criminal suspect on the run)
to uncover (a criminal plot)/to break open and capture
to order the return of stolen goods
to conclude a case/to wind up
to solve a case/shabby old table
occurrence (refers to time and place esp. of a criminal act)/to take place/to occur/to advertise freelance work
a misjudged legal case/a miscarriage (of justice)
to be at large (of a criminal)
